verses.text: And the rulers of the people dwelt at Jerusalem: the rest of the people also cast lots, to bring one of ten to dwell in Jerusalem the holy city, and nine parts \add to dwell\add* in \add other\add* cities.
And the people blessed all the men that willingly offered themselves to dwell at Jerusalem.

Now these \add are\add* the chief of the province that dwelt in Jerusalem: but in the cities of Judah dwelt every one in his possession in their cities, \add to wit\add* , Israel, the priests, and the Levites, and the Nethinims, and the children of Solomon's servants.

And at Jerusalem dwelt \add certain\add* of the children of Judah, and of the children of Benjamin. Of the children of Judah; Athaiah the son of Uzziah, the son of Zechariah, the son of Amariah, the son of Shephatiah, the son of Mahalaleel, of the children of Perez;
And Maaseiah the son of Baruch, the son of Col-hozeh, the son of Hazaiah, the son of Adaiah, the son of Joiarib, the son of Zechariah, the son of Shiloni.
All the sons of Perez that dwelt at Jerusalem \add were\add* four hundred sixty and eight valiant men.
And these \add are\add* the sons of Benjamin; Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Joed, the son of Pedaiah, the son of Kolaiah, the son of Maaseiah, the son of Ithiel, the son of Jesaiah.
And after him, Gabbai, Sallai, nine hundred twenty and eight.
And Joel the son of Zichri \add was\add* their overseer: and Judah the son of Senuah \add was\add* second over the city.
Of the priests: Jedaiah the son of Joiarib, Jachin.
Seraiah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, \add was\add* the ruler of the house of God.

And their brethren that performed the work of the house \add were\add* eight hundred twenty and two: and Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pelaliah, the son of Amzi, the son of Zechariah, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchiah,
And his brethren, chief of the fathers, two hundred forty and two: and Amashai the son of Azareel, the son of Ahasai, the son of Meshillemoth, the son of Immer,
And their brethren, mighty men of valor, a hundred twenty and eight: and their overseer \add was\add* Zabdiel, the son of \add one of\add* the great men.
Also of the Levites: Shemaiah the son of Hashub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, the son of Bunni;
And Shabbethai and Jozabad, of the chief of the Levites, \add had\add* the oversight of the outward business of the house of God.

And Mattaniah the son of Micha, the son of Zabdi, the son of Asaph, \add was\add* the principal to begin the thanksgiving in prayer: and Bakbukiah the second among his brethren, and Abda the son of Shammua, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun.
All the Levites in the holy city \add were\add* two hundred and eighty four.
Moreover the porters, Akkub, Talmon, and their brethren that kept the gates, \add were\add* an hundred and seventy two.
And the residue of Israel, of the priests, \add and\add* the Levites, \add were\add* in all the cities of Judah every one in his inheritance.
But the Nethinims dwelt in Ophel: and Ziha and Gispa \add were\add* over the Nethinims.

The overseer also of the Levites at Jerusalem \add was\add* Uzzi the son of Bani, the son of Hashabiah, the son of Mattaniah, the son of Micha. Of the sons of Asaph, the singers \add were\add* over the business of the house of God.
For \add it was\add* the king's commandment concerning them, that a certain portion should be for the singers, due for every day.
And Pethahiah the son of Meshezabeel, of the children of Zerah the son of Judah \add was\add* at the king's hand in all matters concerning the people.

And for the villages, with their fields, \add some\add* of the children of Judah dwelt at Kirjath-arba, and \add in\add* its villages, and at Dibon, and \add in\add* its villages, and at Jekabzeel, and \add in\add* its villages,
And at Jeshua, and at Moladah, and at Beth-phelet,
And at Hazar-shual, and at Beer-sheba, and \add in\add* its villages,
And at Ziklag, and at Mekonah, and in its villages,
And at En-rimmon, and at Zareah, and at Jarmuth,
Zanoah, Adullam, and \add in\add* their villages, at Lachish, and its fields, at Azekah, and \add in\add* its villages. And they dwelt from Beer-sheba to the valley of Hinnom.
The children also of Benjamin from Geba \add dwelt\add* at Michmash, and Aija, and Beth-el, and \add in\add* their villages.
\add And\add* at Anathoth, Nob, Ananiah,
Hazor, Ramah, Gittaim,
Hadid, Zeboim, Neballat,
Lod, and Ono, the valley of artificers.
And of the Levites \add were\add* divisions \add in\add* Judah, \add and\add* in Benjamin.
